      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

      • menu

        public static int menu(java.util.Scanner sk)

        menu

        Description: Prints the menu, takes the option selected and returns the selected option.

        Preconditions:

        • sk Scanner created before hand.

        Postconditions:

        • After printing the menu it saves the choice in a variable
        Parameters:
        sk - Scanner name used in main.
        Returns:
        The option selected by the user.

      • registerExpense

        public static void registerExpense(java.util.Scanner sk,
                                   java.lang.String[] names,
                                   double[] expenses,
                                   int position)

        registerExpense

        Description: Stores the name and the cost entered inside two different arrays.

        Preconditions:

        • sk Scanner created before hand.
        • names String[] length 20.
        • expenses double[] length 20.
        • position int between 0 and 19.

        Postconditions:

        • The name is saved in names and the expense is saved in expenses in the index position
        Parameters:
        sk - Scanner name used in main.
        names - Array that holds 20 names.
        expenses - Array that holds 20 expenses.
        position - index where the name and expense are saved.

      • totalExpense

        public static void totalExpense(java.util.Scanner sk,
                                java.lang.String[] names,
                                double[] expenses)

        totalExpense

        Description: The inputed name is looped checking for a match in the String[] and when the inputed name matches that number saved in the double[] is added to the total. After, the total is printed.

        Preconditions:

        • sk Scanner created before hand.
        • names String[] length 20.
        • expenses double[] length 20.

        Postconditions:

        • The calculated expense for the user asked is printed
        Parameters:
        sk - Scanner name used in main.
        names - Array that holds 20 names.
        expenses - Array that holds 20 expenses.

      • avgExpense

        public static void avgExpense(java.util.Scanner sk,
                              double[] expenses,
                              int counter)

        avgExpense

        Description: Calculates and prints the average of all the users in the expense array.

        Preconditions:

        • sk Scanner created before hand.
        • expenses double[] length 20.
        • position int between 0 and 19.

        Postconditions:

        • ]The total expenses entered in the array ar printed.
        Parameters:
        sk - Scanner name used in main.
        expenses - Array that holds 20 expenses.
        counter - int that holds how many users are in the expenses array.
